name: 吞食拜天地：三国刘蓓传（The legend of Liu Bei of the Three Kingdoms）
name_original: 吞食拜天地：三国刘蓓传（The legend of Liu Bei of the Three Kingdoms）
description:
This is a traditional turn-based RPG game made with RMMV, so the game will be very plain, with no flashy standing graphics and scenes!

The theme is based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, and the characters are completely feminine, of course, this is not an R18 game!

Unlike a classic game, it does not use a troop system, but a traditional Japanese RPG class system, with a total of 30+ collectible generals and 12 classes...

Each general corresponds to 1 class and five element attributes, although it will still lead to the strength of high-value generals, but low-value generals can also be used...

I wanted to release it as a free game, but life is really stretched, and I don't think the quality of this game is high, so please be cautious when buying...

After that, I'll be working on two more games in production, so stay tuned...
